name: Steamitemtracker
tagline: Track the location and item ID of steam items using steam's developer API.
body:
### Find your Steam, Dota2, CS:GO, and TF2 items
Track items you have traded to find their item IDs and location with a user friendly GUI that implement's steam developer API to easily give users access to their detailed steam trade history. 

### Open Source
Open source means anyone is able to view and modify the code. Basically, anyone is able to contribute to the project!

### User friendly and quick
You don't need any extensive knowledge of Steam's API to use this extension! A feature-extensive GUI with a developer console included gives you the most flexibility. 

### Safe and Secure
Steam Item Tracker doesn't store any of your personal information or trading data. The extension reads information about your trades from steam's developer API and calls them back to you, with no third party servers.

### Donate
This extension is a non-profit project of mine I've worked on in my free time. To support future updates and projects I appreciate all donations.

My BTC Address: 1XCPdWb6kk7PGfvbdRbRuNh51aPc4vqC7
